text: 10.45-46 Apo 2.4, 10.23, 11.18, 19.6, Gal 3.14 Bak lek, takaw yɨbɨl keke agɨlɨg, God yɨb nop ak dad aplanɨlak. Anɨgelak, bɨ Juda Jisas nop gos lɨnɨŋɨd, Pita ayɨp owlak okok, kɨli judɨl nɨŋɨd anɨb agɨlak, God ne Kawnan ne ak, binɨb Juda mel okol kɨlop monmon yokek apɨl bak lup agɨlak. Pita pen agak,
